HGLD.summary: Patagonia Gold Corp., a mining and exploration company, engages in the exploration, exploitation, and development of gold and silver projects in Argentina and Chile. Its principal project is the Calcatreu project located in south central Rio Negro Province. The company also holds interests in Lomada gold deposit; La Manchuria project; La Josefina project; and Martha Mill property. It holds an option to acquire a 100% interest in the Mina Angela property located in the Province of Chubut, Argentina. In addition the company's exploration projects comprise Tornado and HuracÃ¡n, Sarita, Los Toldo, El Gateado, Bajo Pobre project, and La Valenciana. Patagonia Gold Corp. is headquartered in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
